products.title: Coolpad Note 3(Black, 16GB)
products.info: The Note 3 is that the most cost-effective below Rs.10,000 phone to come back with a fingerprint sensor that works and works quite well at that.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy On5 (Black, 8 GB)
products.info: Samsung Galaxy On5 with sleek design will come with unique built in features like the UDS (Ultra Data Saving) Mode and 4G Download Booster which promise to provide a differentiated experience to the millennial.

products.title: Lenovo Vibe K4 Note (White,16GB)
products.info: Lenovo K4 Note is the First smartphone with TheaterMax technology and Dolby Atmos surround sound, helps you watch your videos on virtual giant screen cinematic experience using ANT VR head-mount.
